title: 20 Stylized Sci-Fi Lights
description: A collection of 20 Stylized Sci-Fi Lights for all your project needs, plus 14 seamless Sci-Fi Materials!
longDescription:
A collection of 20 unique and stylized Sci-Fi lights! The models included are rich in detail without breaking the bank. Most models will range between 2,000 Triangles and 30,000 but there is a mesh or two that would be considered high-poly, at 80k Triangles.


Important note: This product bundles an updated version of my Seamless Sci-Fi Materials Vol_00! The package now includes a Glass material and an Emissive material atop the existing 12 seamless textures/materials.


Demo


You will find 20 static meshes with emissive texture slots perfect for soft, ambient lighting with little overhead costs. The project also includes preset-up Blueprints with light objects and variables adjusted to create cinematic lighting effects. You can cut down on the BP's performance costs by simply replacing the BP lights with default ones so you can easily wipe out the "cinematic" values I have setup (mostly pertaining to casting volumetric shadows etc).


The project also includes an udpated version of my Seamles Sci=Fi Materials Vol_00 product. The new version includes the emissive material and a Glass material. These materials are highly customizable and easy to modify. Check out the product page for a full description of what you're getting bundled along in this product! :]


Join our Discord to get help with any questions or make suggestions!
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  20 Static Meshes (Lights) with Emissive texture slots for soft lighting, 1 Static Mesh (Material model)
  •  20 Light Blueprints with cinematic quality lights preset for use. 3 utility Blueprints for camera, text and game mode demo.
  •  SF_Materials_V00 includes 14 seamless materials, highly customizable and easy to modify variables and texture slots so you can expand with your own textures!
  • 4 Master Materials, 18 Material Instances
  • 12 textures in 512, 1,024, 2,048, and 4,096 resolutions, neatly organized for easy swapping. 2k materials loaded by default


Number of Unique Meshes: 21 Static Meshes

Collision: Yes automatically generated "use complex collisions as simple"

Vertex Count: range 1,000 to 30,000 and one model at 83,000

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 4 Master Materials, 18 Instances

Number of Textures: 12 textures, all available in 512 up to 4k resolution. 1 dirt texture only in 2k

Texture Resolutions: 512, 1024, 2048, 4096

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No

Documentation: N/A

Important/Additional Notes: This product bundles an updated version of my Seamless Sci-Fi Materials Vol_00! The package now includes a Glass material and an Emissive material atop the existing 12 seamless textures/materials.
